title: MlModel
description: This schema defines the Model entity. Models are algorithms trained on data to find patterns or make predictions.

featureType.description: This enum defines the type of data stored in a ML Feature.

featureSourceDataType.description: This enum defines the type of data of a ML Feature source.

featureName.description: Local name (not fully qualified name) of the ML Feature.

featureSourceName.description: Local name (not fully qualified name) of a ML Feature source.

fullyQualifiedFeatureSourceName.description: Fully qualified name of the ML Feature Source that includes `serviceName.[databaseName].tableName/fileName/apiName.columnName[.nestedColumnName]`.

fullyQualifiedFeatureName.description: Fully qualified name of the ML Feature that includes `modelName.featureName`.

featureSource.description: This schema defines the sources of a ML Feature.

dataType.description: Data type of the source (int, date etc.).

dataSource.description: Description of the Data Source (e.g., a Table)

tags.description: Tags associated with the feature source.

mlFeature.description: This schema defines the type for an ML Feature used in an ML Model.

dataType.description: Data type of the column (numerical vs. categorical).

featureSources.description: Columns used to create the ML Feature.

featureAlgorithm.description: Description of the algorithm used to compute the feature, e.g., PCA, bucketing...

mlHyperParameter.description: This schema defines the type for an ML HyperParameter used in an ML Model.

mlStore.description: Location containing the ML Model. It can be a storage layer and/or a container repository.

storage.description: Storage Layer containing the ML Model data.

imageRepository.description: Container Repository with the ML Model image.

id.description: Unique identifier of an ML Model instance.

name.description: Name that identifies this ML Model.

fullyQualifiedName.description: A unique name that identifies an ML Model.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this ML Model.

description.description: Description of the ML Model, what it is, and how to use it.

algorithm.description: Algorithm used to train the ML Model.

mlFeatures.description: Features used to train the ML Model.

mlHyperParameters.description: Hyper Parameters used to train the ML Model.

target.description: For supervised ML Models, the value to estimate.

dashboard.description: Performance Dashboard URL to track metric evolution.

mlStore.description: Location containing the ML Model. It can be a storage layer and/or a container repository.

server.description: Endpoint that makes the ML Model available, e.g,. a REST API serving the data or computing predictions.

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to this entity.

usageSummary.description: Latest usage information for this ML Model.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

changeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

deleted.description: When `true` indicates the entity has been soft deleted.
